title: How the Wollaston Station Closure Affects Your Trip
image_alt: Yankee bus shuttle during Wollaston's renovation
text: On January 8, Wollaston Station on the Red Line closed to undergo improvements to make it a fully accessible, modern, and code-compliant station. Bus shuttle service is running.

title: Wollaston Construction Activities
image_alt: Construction at Wollaston Station: gypsum board installation at headhouse, with metal framing
text: Learn about lane restrictions due to construction, plus what work is being done at Wollaston Station.
